alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 4:21AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Fog Possible This Morning... Patchy fog will be possible across portions of the area, especially the western Atlantic Metro and interior portions of Southwest Florida through the morning commute. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around 1 mile at times, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities to one-half of a mile. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time for travel.
